com.redhat.rhn.testing

Class UserTestUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • junit.framework.Assert
      • com.redhat.rhn.testing.UserTestUtils

  • public class UserTestUtils
extends junit.framework.Assert
    A class that allows us to easily create test users.

      • findNewUser

        public static User findNewUser(java.lang.String userName,
                               java.lang.String orgName,
                               boolean orgAdmin)
        Creates a new User and Org with the given userName and orgName. The current time is appended to the given username and orgName.
        Parameters:
        userName - Name of user.
        orgName - Name of org.
        orgAdmin - if you want the user to have the ORG_ADMIN role
        Returns:
        User the newly created User.

      • assertOrgAdmin

        public static void assertOrgAdmin(User user)
        Check that user is an org_admin, and that there is at least one server visible to her. The second check is necessary because of bz156752

        user - the user for which to check

        user - the user for which to check
